content.body: feels rather vexing to me how an inline <emu-grammar> gives significantly more space on the left than the right, but not sure if I should report this
(basically emu-production.inline has "padding-left: 1ex;" while the other pieces are using 0.5ex for either margin or padding)
esmeta can now do exactly this: https://youtu.be/4XMjJPNmuBM?si=kmhtsRIFeSYSf1pl&t=775

content.body: Are the in-person meetings typically streamed or otherwise setup for remote attendance?
they are hybrid meetings. many people participate remotely

I’m planning on attending the TC39 108th Plenary in-person as a delegate from Google. For that, I need an invitation letter from the conference hosts / organizers based in Spain to get my Schenzhen visa. Any idea how I can obtain that?
